Class ib_FilterBrushedMetal

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.ib_FilterBrushedMetal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.BufferedImageOp

    public class ib_FilterBrushedMetal
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.image.BufferedImageOp
    A filter which produces an image simulating brushed metal.

      • getRGB

        public int[] getRGB(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
           int x,
           int y,
           int width,
           int height,
           int[] pixels)
        A convenience method for getting ARGB pixels from an image. This tries to avoid the performance penalty of BufferedImage.getRGB unmanaging the image.
